H0.text: Mercury, Venus, Earth, and Mars are the planets in order from closest to the Sun to farthest from the Sun.

H1.text: Mars, Mercury, Earth, Venus is the order of the planets from closest to the Sun to farthest from the Sun.

H2.text: Earth, Venus, Mercury, Mars is the order of the planets from closest to the Sun to farthest from the Sun.

H3.text: Venus, Earth, Mars, Mercury are the planets ordered from closest to the Sun to farthest from the Sun.

A4.text: Closest to the Sun in order of increasing distance are the four terrestrial planets â€“ Mercury, Venus, Earth and Mars.
